Articles.Content:
Not for me. In the aviation tech node. They did get a model pass so they don't look like they used to. You sure you aren't just missing them?

![C337A2FEA3AC4150ED85358F0AA78ECAEED96219](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/39747379227445844/C337A2FEA3AC4150ED85358F0AA78ECAEED96219/)

> 
> Not for me. In the aviation tech node. They did get a model pass so they don't look like they used to. You sure you aren't just missing them?
> [http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/39747379227445844/C337A2FEA3AC4150ED85358F0AA78ECAEED96219/](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/39747379227445844/C337A2FEA3AC4150ED85358F0AA78ECAEED96219/)

oh? in new form?!![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) look like super saiyan..![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) nice new model huh..![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Oh those look much nicer than the old swept wings.

Had the same problem with the NCS adapter, but found it eventually.

But you haven't even seen what 1.0 did to planes that used a ton of swept wings.

> 
> Got a rude surprise from 1.0, but hey, it still flies!
